title: Secondary Social Studies Teacher Professional Development Program Using Lesson Study

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Collaborative process for current teachers aiming to improve actual classroom instruction, combining asynchronous collaboration via digital tools and face-to-face workshops.

learning_goals: Participants can analyze at least three core teaching strategies for social studies lessons through collaboration with peer teachers during the lesson study phase.
Participants can develop a specific action plan to optimize learner engagement and content delivery when designing lessons.
Participants can propose actionable measures for pedagogical and content-based improvements during the post-lesson reflection process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
